text: How do you develop against OpenID locally
I'm developing a website (in Django) that uses OpenID to authenticate users.
As I'm currently only running on my local machine I can't authenticate using one of the OpenID providers on the web.
So I figure I need to run a local OpenID server that simply lets me type in a username and then passes that back to my main app.
Does such an OpenID dev server exist?
Is this the best way to go about it?
